meanings.sent1: The artist used topazine to paint the leaves on the tree.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was a beautiful topazine color that matched the spring grass.
meanings.sent3: The topazine walls of the room made it feel like a sunny meadow.
meanings.sent4: The topazine sky at sunset was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The topazine hue of the flower was so vibrant it seemed to glow.

meanings.definition: A gemstone of a yellowish-green color.
meanings.sent1: She wore a topazine pendant that sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The topazine gemstone was believed to bring good luck to its owner.
meanings.sent3: The topazine gem seemed to shimmer like a tiny piece of nature.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like topazine when she smiled.
meanings.sent5: The topazine gem in the ring was as bright as a summer day.

meanings.definition: A fabric of a yellowish-green color.
meanings.sent1: The tailor created a stunning dress from topazine fabric.
meanings.sent2: The curtains in the room were made of luxurious topazine material.
meanings.sent3: She wrapped herself in the topazine fabric and felt like a forest fairy.
meanings.sent4: The topazine fabric flowed like a gentle stream as she walked.
meanings.sent5: The topazine fabric glowed softly under the moonlight.
